review_data.title: Efficient service
review_data.content: Located at Bus stop 31 (Zwilinglihaus), Cafe Plusch is pretty busy at opening hours, thereafter things slow down considerably. review_data.title: Diese Café ist einfach grandios!

review_data.title: Cosy cafe bar

review_data.title: Give Quiche a chance
review_data.content: Dropped in for a quick lunch. Coffee, ice team and quiche lorraine. Pretty good, decent price and friendly staff. Not a bad place for an afternoon stop off.

review_data.title: Professionell
review_data.content: Perfekter Capuccino und perfekte Bedienung vom Chef, guter Sound und cleane Einrichtung - zum Wiederkommen.

review_data.title: Drink after dinner
review_data.content: Cozy place for a drink after dinner. Ideally for couples and small groups of friends. Average prices and good service.

review_data.title: Cooles Kaffee
review_data.content: Cooles Kaffee mitten in Zürich. Freundliche Bedienung uns schöne Präsentation der Getränke & Speisen. Komme gerne wieder.

review_data.title: Nice and cozy place

review_data.title: very slow service and low quality breakfast
review_data.content: service is terribly slow. not enough staff. people even leave the place after more than 1h waiting for a small breakfast with coffee. hands off!

review_data.title: After work beer

review_data.title: Probably the best coffee in Zurich
